-KqzAhRZAQ49UBexE_Pn.Title: To create or join a room click the top left icon

-KqzB-rY1GyXfsFj6AzF.Title: You can hover or click an item to see the delete icon

-KqzB3nhuhTmoOwRzhY9.Title: Double clicking an item crosses it off

-KqzBAhwjCGJWLy9iQvm.Title: The 'plus' icon on the top right will hide the input field for adding items

-KqzXzuSTuS834HiXJ7w.Title: Add #roomName at the end of a URL for easy access or bookmarking

-KqzY5-zewWZPQssOPFf.Title: For example to bookmark the Songs room - jisy.me/jList#Songs or jisy.me/jList/#Songs - both work.

-KqzY84HjL2LE99ZJh7N.Title: You can include basic html in your items such as <b>bold</b>, <i>Italics</i>, <u>Underline</u>"

-KqzY9h7F9bhDvoUlNDH.Title: This list is locked so all changes here are not permanent

-KqzYAjRTqK4AkDeW_Bx.Title: These instructions will only show on initial load or on a clean reload

-KqzglYlsLPcdWCmvbeN.Title: For the code and full list of features go to the GitHub Project
